ABOUT THE PITSTOP

Fueling the American Dream

Our Story

Born from a love of high-speed racing and hard-working farming, the Flyin' Farmer Pitstop is more than just a gas station. It's a tribute to the spirit of the Ozarks.

We believe in quality—whether that's the fuel in your tank, the smoke on our brisket, or the friendly service you get at the counter. When you stop here, you're part of the team.

Locally Owned

Proudly serving Jenkins, MO & Surrounding Areas.
